sentences.en: Already a celebrity in his field, this "salutary tyrant, " as Riboud called him, dictated "which books to read, what political ideas I should have, which museums and galleries to visit.
sentences.cn: 这位被里布称为“有益的暴君”的摄影师当时已经是这一领域的名人，他规定了“我该看什么书，持有什么政治理念，去什么博物馆和画廊”。

sentences.en: But businessmen hope his warning will have a salutary effect.
sentences.cn: 然而商人们期望总统的预告将会起到有益的效应.

sentences.en: Caveat Emptor, buyer beware, is a salutary reminder to any purchaser.
sentences.cn: “买主各自小心”, 这是对任何买主的有益提示.

sentences.en: I notice we have janitors and janitresses now in offices, and our young men unfortunately miss that salutary branch of business education.
sentences.cn: 我注意到我们现在办公室里都有工友，所以很可惜，年轻人就错过了商业教育中这个有益的环节。

sentences.en: It was a salutary experience to be in the minority.
sentences.cn: 敌众我寡时倒是可以磨炼人。

sentences.en: One can only hope that the result will be an equally salutary debate.
sentences.cn: 我们只能希望这本书引发是一场同样有益的争论。

sentences.en: That is a new economic model of sorts but it is hardly salutary.
sentences.cn: 这算得上是某种新的经济模式,但几乎不会带来任何好处.

sentences.en: The letter had a very salutary effect.
sentences.cn: 这封信好似一剂苦口良药。

sentences.en: The punishment had a salutary effect on the boy.
sentences.cn: 这项处罚对那个男孩产生了有利的影响.

sentences.en: To see ourselves as others see us is a most salutary gift.
sentences.cn: 客观地看待自己是极其难能可贵的.

words.tran_cn: 清爽的；气候有益健康的

trans.tran_en: a salutary experience is unpleasant but teaches you something
